pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal and Fast Univariate k-Means Clustering // A dynamic programming algorithm for optimal univariate k-means clustering. Minimizing the sum of squares of within-cluster distances, the algorithm guarantees optimality and reproducibility. Its advantage over heuristic k-means algorithms in efficiency and accuracy is increasingly pronounced as the number of clusters k increases. It provides an alternative to heuristic k-means algorithms for univariate clustering.
